notes: Processes radioactive, fissile, and exotic element feedstocks into reactor fuel pellets, fusion fuel, superconducting materials, and radiation-shielding composites.
throughput_mult scales batch completion speed relative to the recipe's base build_time_s.
efficiency is the fraction of listed input materials consumed; values below 1.0 represent improved isotope yield and reduced waste.
max_recipe_tier is the highest min_tech_tier recipe this unit can process.
max_concurrent_recipes is the number of recipe slots running in parallel.
